txt.en: You have been tasked with thwarting a group of stone-giants within the rocky slopes of Câr Bronach.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from Câr Bronach. A group of stone-giants are causing problems upon the peaks of Gundabad! We must do what we can to stop these giants and send them on their way.

'If their caves are ruined and their food spoiled, then perhaps they will leave these mountains for good!'

'Maddened stone-giants take to their dwellings in the rocky slopes of Câr Bronach, and where they walk, only trouble will follow….\n\n'Your mission is to thwart a group of stone-giants within the rocky slopes of Câr Bronach.'
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
Your mission is to thwart a group of stone-giants within the rocky slopes of Câr Bronach.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel.

'Well done! With those stone-giants defeated, Câr Bronach is once again safe. Perhaps it is time to for more dwarves to start scouting the slopes of Gundbad. Just as the city within, the whole mountain must be protected.'
